title: Ceaser from Black Ink Crew interview and more
itunes:title: Ceaser from Black Ink Crew interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had Ceaser from "Black Ink Crew" stop by where he spoke about his break up with his ex Dutches, opening new locations, and even tattooing penises, PAUSE! Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" Rita Ora after she put up a picture with her and Conner McGregor with the caption "Date Night", even though Connor McGregor is a married man. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one listener needing advice on how to pop the question to his girl. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Ceaser from "Black Ink Crew" stop by where he spoke about his break up with his ex Dutches, opening new locations, and even tattooing penises, PAUSE! Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" Rita Ora after she put up a picture with her and Conner McGregor with the caption "Date Night", even though Connor McGregor is a married man. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one listener needing advice on how to pop the question to his girl. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
